Entries.nikolaiwood: @^If you have extra wood I'd love to take it off your hands.^I'll pay you of course^-Nikolai %item quest 388 true %%
Entries.colddrink: @^I would kill for something cold to drink.^If you could bring me a beer that would be awesome.^I'll pay you of course^-Nikolai %item quest 346 true %%
Entries.costume: @^I've been looking everywhere for cloth for my spirits eve costume. If you could bring me some I would be grateful.^I'll pay you of course^ -Nikolai %item quest 428 true %%
Entries.coal: @^I'm wanting to grill soon but I don't have coal if you has extra can I have it?^I'll pay you of course^-Nikolai %item quest 382 true %%
